articles.title: Supreme Court Seems Skeptical of Trump Colorado Ballot Case
articles.description: During oral arguments, Supreme Court justices from both ideological wings appeared inclined to reject Colorado's disqualification of Donald Trump from the state's primary ballot, suggesting that individual states shouldn't have the power to bar presidential candidates under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause.

articles.title: King Charles III diagnosed with cancer, Buckingham Palace announces
articles.description: Buckingham Palace revealed that King Charles III has been diagnosed with cancer discovered during his recent prostate treatment. While the exact type of cancer hasn't been disclosed, the King has begun regular treatments and postponed public duties while continuing state business.

articles.title: Boeing replaces head of 737 Max program after mid-air panel blowout
articles.description: Boeing has replaced Ed Clark, the head of its 737 Max program, with Katie Ringgold as part of a broader safety and quality overhaul following the Alaska Airlines incident where a door panel blew out mid-flight. The change comes amid increased scrutiny of Boeing's manufacturing processes.
